thread.section_title: AnaJet Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AnaJet | anajet.com
thread.title: David Small

author: David Small
title: David Small
text:
Bought an Anajet Sprint 5 years ago after researching various DTG brands. Liked their closed loop ink system and lifetime customer support. Shawn their sales guy was terrific and not at all pushy. Customer support can get busy, but my questions have almost always been answered within 24 hours by phone or email. Supply orders always shipped quickly.
Slight learning curve for someone with no printing or graphics background, but easy to operate.
Considering buying an mp5 or mp10.
Thx,
Dave Small
Hockeyjerseyoutlet.com
